ResourceHeader.Description:
This data set consists of all of the calibrated flight software version 4 
        (FSW4) data collected by the JADE (Jovian Auroral Plasma Distributions 
        Experiment) on-board the Juno spacecraft.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
Allegrini, F., Wilson, R.J., Ebert, R.W., Loeffler, C.,     
        JUNO J/SW JOVIAN AURORAL DISTRIBUTION CALIBRATED V1.0,  
        JNO-J/SW-JAD-3-CALIBRATED-V1.0, NASA Planetary Data System, 2022, 
        DOI: 10.17189/1519715.

InformationURL.Name: R. J. Wilson. (Version 04.00). JADE Standard Product Data Record and Archive Volume Software Interface Specification

AccessURL.Name: CDPP/AMDA HAPI Server

See the Rules of the road at https://amda.cdpp.eu/help/policy.html . Please acknowledge the Data Providers.
